footer.textRight: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

about.Title: MUSIC & OBSESSION
about.Paragraph1PartOne: At HYLLS, we are dedicated to forging exceptional musical experiences.
about.Paragraph1PartTwo: We are more than a record label; we are craftsmen of sound, experts in taking the musical vision of artists to new heights.
about.Paragraph1PartThree: Our passion is creation, our strength lies in innovation and quality.
about.Paragraph2PartOne: From composition to production, from distribution to promotion,
about.Paragraph2PartTwo: we guide every step with an unwavering commitment to excellence.
about.Paragraph2PartThree: We are the platform where musical dreams find their home, where melodies are transformed into masterpieces.

contact.Title: CONTACT US
contact.Subject: Subject
contact.Name: Name
contact.Conditions: I have read and accept the

synck.Paragraph1PartOne: Discover our new web and mobile application platform designed to meet the needs of artists and music producers of all levels.
synck.Paragraph1PartTwo: It radically simplifies the way you share your musical creations, providing an intuitive and engaging experience. From amateurs to experts,
synck.Paragraph1PartThree: SYNCK is here to transform the way you share your music.

bodyServicios.Paragraph1PartOne: Customized beats that adapt to the uniqueness of each artist and with an extensive catalog,
bodyServicios.Paragraph1PartTwo: we do not limit ourselves to genres;
bodyServicios.Paragraph1PartThree: we fuse the best of all to produce unique works, bringing to each song the distinctive stamp of our techniques.
bodyServicios.Paragraph2PartOne: We rely on state-of-the-art technologies and a meticulous approach to each production.
bodyServicios.Paragraph2PartTwo: From the subtlest nuances to the most ambitious sonic visions, our methodology employs internationally recognized best practices.
bodyServicios.Text1: Identification of objectives, selection of platforms and launching strategies.
bodyServicios.Text2: Preparation of promotional material, covers, metadata and audio formats.
bodyServicios.Text3: Establishment of launch dates, social media promotion strategies and advertising campaigns.
bodyServicios.Text4: Performance tracking, playback metrics analysis, sales and listener feedback.
bodyServicios.Text5: Strategic adjustments according to performance, exploration of new opportunities and constant updating.
bodyServicios.AudiovisualText: With a combination of innovative techniques and unlimited creativity.
bodyServicios.AudiovisualText1: First class audiovisual production to take your music to new horizons..
bodyServicios.AudiovisualText2: From conceptualization to realization, our creative team works to capture the essence of your music in every image.
bodyServicios.LegalText1: From drafting and reviewing contracts to managing copyrights and licenses,
bodyServicios.LegalText2: we are committed to safeguarding your interests as an artist
bodyServicios.LegalText3: We work to ensure that each agreement is solid and beneficial to you, allowing you to focus on your music with the peace of mind that your rights are protected.
